Episodes.Title: It's About Time
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: When Mark Grayson finally inherits powers from his superhero father, it's a dream come true. But there's more to being a hero than just choosing a name and costume.

Episodes.Title: Here Goes Nothing
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.

Episodes.Title: Who You Calling Ugly?
Episodes.Writer: Chris Black, Robert Kirkman, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark has to cut a study date short to help save Mount Rushmore from a crazed scientist. Robot deals with Action - Comic as he assembles a new team of world-saving superheroes.

Episodes.Title: Neil Armstrong, Eat Your Heart Out
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Ryan Ottley, Ryan Ridley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: It's two firsts for Mark: a first date and a first trip to another planet. At the same time, Nolan and Debbie revisit their own first vacation together.

Episodes.Title: That Actually Hurt
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Christine Lavaf, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Feeling confident in his new abilities, Mark risks a team-up with a local villain to take down a crime lord, while simultaneously juggling school and a new relationship.

Episodes.Title: You Look Kinda Dead
Episodes.Director: Paul Furminger, Jae Harm, Jeff Allen
Episodes.Writer: Curtis Gwinn, Robert Kirkman, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.

Episodes.Title: We Need to Talk
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Ryan Ottley, Simon Racioppa
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Feeling lost and confused, Mark looks for advice from Eve. At the same time, everyone's looking for him.

Episodes.Title: Where I Really Come From
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Ryan Ottley, Cory Walker
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark must prove he's become the hero he's always wanted to be by stopping an unstoppable force.
